alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued June 07 at 4:42PM EDT until June 08 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM EDT THURSDAY THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.5 to 13.0 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Essex MA, Suffolk MA, Eastern Norfolk MA, Eastern Plymouth MA and Barnstable MA Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM EDT Thursday through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding is expected along the North Shore from Gloucester to Newburyport. Wave action will likely cause some washover onto coastal roads around the time of high tide. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Gloucester Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 15.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 08/03 AM 11.7/12.2 2.2/ 2.7 1.1/ 1.6 1 Minor 08/04 PM 10.4/10.9 0.9/ 1.4 1.2/ 1.7 1 None 09/04 AM 11.4/11.9 1.9/ 2.3 1.1/ 1.6 1 Minor 09/05 PM 10.2/10.7 0.7/ 1.1 1.0/ 1.5 1-2 None 10/05 AM 11.1/11.6 1.6/ 2.0 1.1/ 1.6 1 Minor Merrimack River near Newburyport MA MLLW Categories -
